problem.markdown:
Check your ability to answer some of the questions relevant to the simulation that you used.
1. When water flows over a rectangular suppressed weir, the negative pressure created beneath the nappe
( ) Decrease the discharge (x) Increase the discharge ( ) Does not affect the discharge ( ) None of these
2. For most economical rectangular section of a channel, the depth is kept
( ) 1/4th of width ( ) 3 times the hydraulic radius (x) 1/2 of the width ( ) Hydraulic mean depth
3. A notch is a device used to measure
(x) rate of change of fluid through small channels ( ) rate of change of fluid through large channels ( ) rate of change of fluid through any type of channels ( ) None of the above
4. For a suppressed rectangular weir an arrangement for aeration of nappe is necessary______
( ) To maintain water quality ( ) To prevent submergence of the weir ( ) To have the highest value of Cd (x) To have a constant head discharge relationship which is independent of time
5. 4. The sheet of liquid flowing over a notch is known as
(x) Nappe ( ) Sill ( ) Crest ( ) None
problem.p: Check your ability to answer some of the questions relevant to the simulation that you used.
1. When water flows over a rectangular suppressed weir, the negative pressure created beneath the nappe
2. For most economical rectangular section of a channel, the depth is kept
3. A notch is a device used to measure

choicegroup.choice: rate of change of fluid through small channels
rate of change of fluid through large channels
rate of change of fluid through any type of channels

problem.p: 4. For a suppressed rectangular weir an arrangement for aeration of nappe is necessary______

choicegroup.choice: To prevent submergence of the weir
To have the highest value of Cd
To have a constant head discharge relationship which is independent of time
